show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Guest: Dr. Michael Greer Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com , interviews Dr Michael Greer. Dr. <!--more--> Greer attended HahnemannMedicalUniversity, and interned at MadiganArmyMedicalCenter.
Dr Greer is an integrative medicine specialist focused on holistic, herbal, homeopathic and naturopathic solutions for health, incorporating the best of conventional medicine with natural medicine products and philosophies.
 He shares his experience in publications and in speaking engagements at universities and seminars internationally on a wide range of topics, including metabolic diseases, adrenal health, thyroid regulation, estrogen dominance, osteoporosis, men’s health, and laboratory testing to optimize wellness and longevity.
On today’s show, Dr Greer focuses on Hair Loss and its relationship to Stress- the relationship is multi faceted, involving Thyroid, estrogen Dominance, Blood sugar control, detoxification  mineral content, and  vascular flow.
Contact: www.michaelgreermd.com
